title: Balloon 8 - MIDNIGHT
text:
HAPPY NEW YEAR!
Celebrate the new year with friends. And don’t forget to fill in your 2023/2024 New Year sheets.

title: Balloon 6 - 11:00PM
text:
Can you sing?
By this time of night it doesn’t really matter.
Let’s do Karaoke! Go to YouTube on the TV and search for Karaoke songs. Who has the best voice?

title: Balloon 4 - 10:00PM
text:
Another Game!
You were great at charades so let’s try another guessing game. Let’s play a game of Headbandz

title: Balloon 2 - 8:30PM
text:
Another Game!
Do you feel creative? Do you like fun?
Everyone grab your devices and let’s play Jackbox on the TV!

title: Balloon 1 - 8:00PM
text:
Time for a game
Let’s play Charades
Click the button below for the name of a movie or song and describe it to your friends using just actions. No words or sounds.

New Charade

title: Balloon 3 - 9:30PM
text:
All that fun has made me hungry! I want a cookie!
But there’s a catch. You have to place the cookie on your forehead and get it to your mouth without using your hands. If it drops on the floor just pick it up and put it back on your head. Mmmmm, I can almost taste it!

title: Balloon 5 - 10:30PM
text:
Tongue Twisters!
Can you say the tongue twisters below? Click the button for a new one and see if you can say it five times in a row.

New Tongue Twister

title: Balloon 7 - 11:30PM
text: It’s getting close to midnight. Time to start to wind down. We have a madlibs story that’s waiting for some words. You’ll find a sheet of sticky notes above the fire place in the basement. Take it down and add adjectives, nouns, etc to the stickies. Then ask Skye’s dad for the story.
